title: Piney Data
text:
About Us
As a data analytics consultantcy, I specialize in helping organizations begin to leverage data to optimize achieve their goals. I bring a decade of experience leveraging data in fundraising, insurance, finance, e-commerce, and risk management. I can help you get your analytics practice off of the ground floor. I offer strategic adivce for measure success, data-driven insights, road maps for analyzing and managing data, and develop customized plans to enhance organizational effectiveness.
Iâ€™m also enthusiastic about helping non-profits start their data and analytics practice to enable an evergreen analytics approach that ensures long-term success and sustainability. My ultimate mission is to empower non-profits to make a positive impact on society while achieving sustainability.

title: Piney Data
text:
Services
We offer a range of services to help organizations start or develop their data and analytics practice, including:

Data infrastructure consulting
Customized data analysis and reporting
Customer engagement strategies
Fundraising and grant writing support
Marketing and communications planning

title: Piney Data
text:
Why Choose Us
At Piney Data, we are committed to helping our clients achieve their goals by providing practical, actionable insights that are grounded in data. We are passionate about the work we do and believe that every organization has the potential to make a meaningful impact on the world.

title: Piney Data
text:
Contact Us
